discharge_note:
Discharge Note for Darth Vader

Date: 2025-02-21  
Time: 12:37  

Patient Information:  
- Species: Dog (Canine - Domestic)  
- Breed: Chihuahua  
- Gender: Male (not neutered)  
- Age: 6 years  
- Weight: 3.2 kg  
- Microchip: Not microchipped  

Consultation Details:  
- Type: Outpatient  
- Reason: Repeat Consultation  

Summary:  
Darth Vader is doing very well following his recent illness. The cough has completely stopped, and he has resumed running and playing normally. He is eating without any issues and appears more lively and healthier overall. His progress is very positive, and he is currently in good health.  

Procedures:  
- Consultation - Repeat (Code: con010, Time: 12:45, Price: 64.5 GBP)  

Medications:  
- No medications prescribed at this time.  

Instructions:  
- Monitor Darth Vader for any recurrence of cough or signs of illness.  
- Allow normal activity; he can continue playing and running as tolerated.  
- Feed him as usual, ensuring he maintains a balanced diet.  
- Keep an eye on his overall behavior and health, and contact us if you notice any concerns or if his condition changes.  
- Ensure he remains safe and comfortable at home.  

Follow-up:  
No follow-up appointment is necessary unless issues develop or new concerns arise.  

We are pleased with his recovery and look forward to his continued good health!
